name: last-of-type
title: :last-of-type Selector
desc: Selects all elements that are the last among siblings of the same element name.

examples.desc: Find the last span in each matched div and add some css plus a hover state.

entries.longdesc: The :last-of-type selector matches elements that have no other element with the same parent and the same element name coming after it in the document tree.
